video_prompt: A dark cyborg with glowing yellow eyes, draped in red fabric, moves with imposing, equine-like steps, its robotic hands articulating. The metallic body subtly glints as it shifts within an industrial setting, hinting at a powerful, imminent action.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical full shot of a dark metallic grey and vibrant red futuristic equine cyborg. Horse-like head with glowing yellow eyes. Upright, imposing posture with draped subdued red fabric around the waist flowing down. Mechanical human-like hands and articulated legs. Dark, textured background with subtle metal truss structure. Diffused lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Imposing, equine-like steps assertively propel a figure forward. Robotic hands articulate with purpose. Metallic surfaces subtly glint as the form shifts. A yellow eye-glow intensifies, hinting at powerful, imminent action, while industrial background elements subtly alter, indicating progression.
